name: Pout
slogan: The world's first phone makeup case
description:
Beauty and technology have united with the launch of Pout Case, the world’s first i-phone make-up case, designed for an on-the-go lifestyle, with accompanying premium, own brand make-up, formulated and developed in Europe and U.S.A. 
Find out more at www.poutcase.com

jobs.title: CEO
jobs.description:
Are you a professional who really wants to make a positive difference yet be part of an exciting, proven lifestyle brand? Do you want to be instrumental & lead the business into new territory and profitability? Do you have a solid grasp of financial modelling, are you passionate about making change, are you a risk-taker and a believer in the changing consumer/citizen landscape? If you are hungry for success and want to take ownership of a brand to push it to the next level - this could be the opportunity for you. 

Pout Case is looking for an ambitious leader to become a fully invested CEO to drive our business forward. If you have a ‘can-do’ attitude and are looking to commit to applying sales strategies that work we would like to talk to you. 

Ideally you will: 
        * Have succeeded in a management role within sales, distribution, Ecommerce or a start-up environment
        * Have developed business analytical and implementation skills 
        * Be able to strategise yet commit to day to day detail /implementation 
        * Write or commission business plans to raise investment if needed
        * Have an entrepreneurial outlook and be able to seek out opportunities for growth 
        * Be someone ambitious, adaptable and unstoppable. 
        * You will be business focused with exceptional drive, grit and attitude to get in touch with prospective clients making a thousand calls if needed, propose meetings & present to large groups of people and to senior leadership teams

This truly describes the kind of personality needed to complement what the business needs. 

 Main Duties and Responsibilities:
        1. Work with the Founder to articulate the vision and ambition, define the proposition and target market, develop the strategic plan and set operating plan and objectives for the team to deliver against
        2. Develop and execute the business plan to deliver brand and financial goals.  Oversee budget development and presentation.  Full profit & loss accountability
        3. Write and commission business plans to raise investment if needed
        4. Provide strong, inspiring leadership to the whole Pout team; attract, build, coach and lead a world-class high performing team
        5. Champion the brand with clients and staff. Be the person who lives, breathes and expounds the brand and the values of the brand through communications, culture and values
        6. Champion and herald the voice of the customer – ensure that all plans, strategies, communications and ideas centre on the customer
        7. Keep abreast of competitor activities and industry developments adapting strategic plan where necessary.  Scan for potential partnerships or acquisition targets
        8. Develop strong strategic partnerships with brands and key influencers to solidify Pout positioning
        9. Establish Sales, Brand and Performance Marketing function to position the brand globally, grow awareness and maximise sales
        10. Build a scalable and world class infrastructure with talented people, flexible systems and processes
        11. Scale Operations 
        12. Responsible for company compliance and financial statutory reporting in operating territories
